alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Mainland Hyde; Pamlico (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 7:08PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Craven, west central Hyde, southeastern Beaufort and Pamlico Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 707 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near South Creek, or 24 miles northeast of James City, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New Bern, Sladesville, Swindell Fork, Scranton, Pamlico Beach, Lowland, Florence, Janeiro, Grantsboro, Royal, Rose Bay, Olympia, Whortonsville, Winsteadville, South Creek, Maribel, Nc Pamlico, Merritt, Swan Quarter Ferry Terminal and Fairfield Harbour. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
